oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Upton Close - Political Broadcast - 1951-04-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Political radio broadcast by Upton Close.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer opening statement -- Upton Close talks about political issues -- Upton Close introduces Harold Veldi -- Harold Veldi discusses sending troops to Europe -- Upton Close closes the program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Radio in politics--United States; Close, Upton, 1894-1960; Hall, Josef Washington, 1894-1960; Parks, Larry, 1914-1975; Velde, Harold Himmel, 1910-1985
